price: Sila akka dooniin tola Rabbiitiin galaana keessa deemtu hin arginee? (kuni) (Rabbiin) mallattoollee Isaa irraa isinitti agarsiisuufi. kana mallattooleetu jira akkaan obsitootaafii galateeffattootaa hundaaf .
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ ٱللَّهِ لِيُرِيَكُم مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٖ شَكُورٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-ful'ka tajrī fī al-baḥri biniʿ'mati al-lahi liyuriyakum min āyātihi inna fī dhālika laāyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūrin
